method: Cover the bottom of a pan with oil and heat briefly. Dice and add the onion, fry until soft (3-4 minutes). While waiting chop the sweet potato.
Peel and grate the ginger. Add the (crushed) garlic and ginger and cook briefly for 1 minute. Add Tikka Masala spice paste and cook for a further minute.
Then add [50]ml of water and cook for a further 3 minutes. Dice the chicken while waiting.
Add the chicken, sweet potatoes and tomatoes, then some water, as needed. Simmer for about 15 minutes until the sweet potato is soft.
Add chickpeas, yoghurt and sugar, and stir.
Turn off the heat and leave to simmer for 4 minutes. Garnish with freshly chopped coriander and serve with rice and naan.
